title: Update League Standings in Real Time
description: As a game ends, an agent must immediately update the official league standings.

tasks.description: Receive the final score and official result of the completed game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the final score from the official scorer.

tasks.description: Update the win/loss records for both teams involved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the records for the two teams.

tasks.description: Recalculate the league standings based on the new records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully re-ranks all teams in the league.

tasks.description: Publish the updated standings to the league website and mobile app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pushes the new standings to all public-facing platforms.
